metadata.name: Questgiver Charlotte
metadata.description:
Welcome to The Sidequest! Inspired by video game side quests, this art is an ode to the nostalgic video games of our youth. Intended to capture the magic and mystery of exploring a fantasy world through games, The Sidequest will allow you to choose your own path--literally--and see where that will lead you. What will you find at the end of your side quest?

Dreamed up and created entirely by @0xCharlotte.
